Package org.mrcp4j.message.request Description

Provides classes for representing and constructing MRCPv2 request messages.

Package Usage

Use MrcpRequestFactory.createRequest(String) or MrcpRequestFactory.createRequest(org.mrcp4j.MrcpMethodName) to construct an MrcpRequest instance.

Related Documentation

For overviews, tutorials, examples, guides, and tool documentation, please see:
  • MRCP4J Project Home
The latest draft of the MRCPv2 specification is available here.
